data.title: Safe & Secure Free Downloads
data.meta_description: CODECPACK.CO - Get the latest updates on free media tools and utilities for Windows. No Format Left Behind!
data.text:
CODECPACK.CO: NO Unwanted Extras. CUT the CLUTTER. KEEP the CONTENT

Download of the week:

File Converter - universal audio, video, documents converter which enables converting video, audio and image files from Windows Explorer's right-click menu. You can customize the application in order to add / remove conversion presets in the files context menus or edit the existing one to change the conversion options. It supports a wide range of audio, video, and image formats.

Click here to download File Converter 2.0.2
